items.question: Are the courses free?
items.answer: Yes. All courses are free for registered students.

items.question: Can I enroll in multiple courses?
items.answer: Yes, you can take as many as you want at your own pace.

items.question: Do I get a certificate?
items.answer: Yes. A digital certificate is issued upon completion.

items.question: Are the courses beginner-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our courses are structured for beginners and go step by step.

items.question: Do I have lifetime access to the course materials?
items.answer: Yes. Once enrolled, you'll retain access to all course content indefinitely.

items.question: Are the course suitable for placement preparation?
items.answer: Absolutely. They are tailored for roles in consulting firms and product-based companies with a case-focus.
